option.name: tipText
option.value: Welcome to Aggress Web Crawler! This project includes pre-configured run configurations for Crawler, Frontend, and WebAdmin. Check Run → Edit Configurations to see them all.

option.name: tipText
option.value: 💡 Use Live Templates for faster coding! Type lombokdata + Tab for @Data classes, service + Tab for Spring services, and more. See all in Settings → Live Templates → Aggress

option.name: tipText
option.value: 🗄️ Database connections are pre-configured! Open Database tool window to access Redis and Elasticsearch with one click.

option.name: tipText
option.value: ☸️ Debug Kubernetes pods directly! Use Kubectl Port Forward: Crawler Debug then Remote Debug: Kubernetes Crawler to debug live code.

option.name: tipText
option.value: 🐳 Manage Docker services visually! Open Services tool window → Docker → Compose to start/stop services with a GUI.
